review_title: Teeny Tiny hoodie has no room for me, let alone my cat.
reviews:
Comically small. I usually fit a woman's large, and ordered an XXL that I could fit into, in a tight and squeaky pinch. Definitely would not also fit my cat.

Fabric is not at all stretchy, and I would recommend ordering 3 or 4 sizes up if you can. The XXL I received fits my boyfriend snugly, who typically fits into my old women's medium size hoodies, but hardly leaves room for my quite-small cat. So if you're a medium and you own a chinchilla/ ferret or a wee kitten, the XXL could work for you.

Seriously, don't buy this. Not worth the money.
product_name: Ladyjiao Womens Mewgaroo Pet Holder Cat Eared kangaroo Pouch Sweatshirt Hoodie

reviews:
I read previous reviews AFTER ordering this hoodie Not the smartest plan, but here we are. From the moment I opened the package I noticed immediately the quality of the hoodie is not the best, but for the price I'm not going to complain too much. The size was surprisingly okay. I was anticipating something that was too small, that I might get stuck in - but it's actually fairly baggy and honestly quite comfortable despite the thin fabric. It feels like something one might wear to bed.

The pouch is quite big and looks comfortable with a soft lining, but my cat doesn't seem to like the hoodie at all - save for the hoodie ties and pom-pom ends. The pouch itself is big enough to accomodate him... But I don't plan to walk around with him in it. He's in the 10-13lb range. I think it will be a strictly cuddle-on-the-couch hoodie.
product_name: Ladyjiao Womens Mewgaroo Pet Holder Cat Eared kangaroo Pouch Sweatshirt Hoodie

review_title: Too small, too thin and doesn't even fit a kitten!
reviews: I'm pretty sure I received the wrong size. The sticker said XL and I measured myself based on the size chart but it's SO TINY. I usually fit in a medium but got a couple sizes up based on reviews and it can't even fit my ragdoll kitten :/ He's 6 months old and it won't fit him, a huge waste of money. I've been trying to find a way to contact the store to see if I got the wrong size but I can't find a way to get in contact. Can't return to amazon due to the amount of cat hair already on it. Super disappointed. You might as well make yourself one at this price.
product_name: Ladyjiao Womens Mewgaroo Pet Holder Cat Eared kangaroo Pouch Sweatshirt Hoodie

review_title: As advertised, but cat hates it.
reviews: The sweater fits as advertised and is what I expected, but my cat absolutely hates this sweater. You have to put an arm under the pocket while cat is inside because it doesn't adequately hold him up (so you can't just put him in the pocket and walk around). This sweater made my cat frustrated and he angrily jumped out of it every time. Note. my cat loves being held and cradled usually. The sweater comes as advertised (in fact it's quite comfy) but be aware that it may not be so fun for your cat...
product_name: Ladyjiao Womens Mewgaroo Pet Holder Cat Eared kangaroo Pouch Sweatshirt Hoodie

reviews: My sister rescued our cat who was being bullied by our other cat and dog. So this was a thank-you gift. She loved it!! Some reviews said to size up, which I did. But I found the size right on. The material is a bit cheap, so I give it 4 stars. But it's a great gift. Our cat is tiny, so no issues fitting in the pouch.
product_name: Ladyjiao Womens Mewgaroo Pet Holder Cat Eared kangaroo Pouch Sweatshirt Hoodie

reviews: Very happy with this purchase overall, and did go up two sizes to allow for extra wiggle room in the kangaroo pouch for the critter. Only downside is that even after washing, I found the fabric to have a very odd/potent smell which is somewhat off putting. Hoping it will just wear off!
product_name: Ladyjiao Womens Mewgaroo Pet Holder Cat Eared kangaroo Pouch Sweatshirt Hoodie

reviews: I swear my cat isn't super obese, just a little chunky... but after 1 or 2 uses of this sweater I can see the inner seams coming undone. It's just not constructed super well for an adult cat. Kittens and skinny cats shouldn't cause the seams to start loosening... Otherwise comfy, fits me great, and cute design.
product_name: Ladyjiao Womens Mewgaroo Pet Holder Cat Eared kangaroo Pouch Sweatshirt Hoodie

reviews: Got this for a present for my girlfriend. After reading reviews, I bought 1 size up (medium instead of small) and it fit my girlfriend perfectly! It arrived a lot faster than I thought it would as well!
product_name: Ladyjiao Womens Mewgaroo Pet Holder Cat Eared kangaroo Pouch Sweatshirt Hoodie

reviews: J’ai acheté ce chandail pour porter mon chihuahua. Elle adore ça. Je porte habituellement du 2xl et j’ai commandé le 3xl il est juste de la bonne taille, mais le tissu n’est pas extensible. J’ai l’intention de le porter au camping cet été, alors le tissu assez mince le rendra confortable à ce moment de l’année. Les manches sont quand même très longues mais assez étroites. La pochette où on installe l’animal est faite de tissu très doux et est munie d’une fermeture éclaire tout le tour pour la retirer facilement lors du lavage. C’est un beau produit en général.
product_name: Ladyjiao Womens Mewgaroo Pet Holder Cat Eared kangaroo Pouch Sweatshirt Hoodie

reviews: This is hilarious. I have an 8 lbs toy poodle and she fits well. A little snug but she actually seemed to enjoy being a little joey. The material feels cheap and thin and the hood is small but overall I'm fairly happy. If you follow their size chart then sizing shouldn't be an issue.
product_name: Ladyjiao Womens Mewgaroo Pet Holder Cat Eared kangaroo Pouch Sweatshirt Hoodie

reviews: Where do I start on how horrible this product is. First you have to order 2 sizes larger just for it to fit. Material is supper thin and cheap. Not warm or comfortable at all. Found many rips in it before even wearing it. This is the same thing you will find on any Chinese website . Don’t buy not worth it.
product_name: Ladyjiao Womens Mewgaroo Pet Holder Cat Eared kangaroo Pouch Sweatshirt Hoodie

reviews: This sweater is definitely for kittens. Not for adult cats. Unless you have slender adult cats like siamese or sphynx. They could fit. My cat is average weight. & it felt like the sweater pocket might rip. He was too big to fit in my opinion. The sweater fit fine without a cat. The embroidered stitching is great. So my only complaint is the sturdiness of the pocket & the pocket could be a lil bigger. Delivery came on time. It's an ok product.
product_name: Ladyjiao Womens Mewgaroo Pet Holder Cat Eared kangaroo Pouch Sweatshirt Hoodie

reviews:
Well in a Hoodiae I am a M and I recommend going up 2 sizes. I ordered a XL because of the reviews I read and I was glad I did. It gives me enough room and my cat enough too. The fabric is a little light tho.
My cat is peacefully sleeping in the pouch as I write this. I havent washed it but i will probably hang it to dry cause I read reviews that the stitches can come apart. I am happy with this purchase
product_name: Ladyjiao Womens Mewgaroo Pet Holder Cat Eared kangaroo Pouch Sweatshirt Hoodie

review_title: Good, but head hole is small
reviews: Make sure you buy at LEAST one size bigger. The head hole is quite small, as is the cat pocket. My 10lb kitty fits perfectly, but my 14lb kitty really fills out the pouch. The material is thin, but still pretty warm. Over all it is a good quality for the price.
product_name: Ladyjiao Womens Mewgaroo Pet Holder Cat Eared kangaroo Pouch Sweatshirt Hoodie

reviews: Arrived with torn and frayed tassel strings, and a large hole in the pouch. I have contacted the seller for my money back, as this hoodie is inexcusable damaged. Don't waste your money on this cheap, horribly made product.
product_name: Ladyjiao Womens Mewgaroo Pet Holder Cat Eared kangaroo Pouch Sweatshirt Hoodie

review_title: Cheap material that feels like it will stretch for heavier cats (I was worried ...
reviews: Order a size or two above your normal size! Cheap material that feels like it will stretch for heavier cats (I was worried it would break/strech when I put my cat in) however it will be perfect for my corn snake! The shipping was really fast, it was expected to arrive after April 5th but I got it March 22nd! Its really cute to look at. Perfect for kittens, small cats, small dogs, and reptiles
product_name: Ladyjiao Womens Mewgaroo Pet Holder Cat Eared kangaroo Pouch Sweatshirt Hoodie

reviews: If you are from North America get one or two sizes bigger. Thin hoodie. Came to Canada quickly.

product_name: Ladyjiao Womens Mewgaroo Pet Holder Cat Eared kangaroo Pouch Sweatshirt Hoodie

reviews: This hoodie was much better than some of the reviews made it sound. It is a little thin but the product looks very polished and is well made. I bought a large and it fits me very well so I definitely recommend getting a size or two up if you want it to fit. It also came a month before expected which was a very exciting surprise. My chihuahua is 10 pounds so she just fits. Any pet that’s bigger than 10 pounds probably won’t fit in this hoodie. In all I’m VERY happy with this hoodie!
product_name: Ladyjiao Womens Mewgaroo Pet Holder Cat Eared kangaroo Pouch Sweatshirt Hoodie

reviews: This sweater was much better than what I was expecting based on the comments. It is very thin which makes it great for just lazing around in as it does not get to hot, I would assume you wouldnt really be buying it as something to wear outside. I have a kitten at the moment and he loves being put inside it and enjoys the little fluffs attached to the hoodie strings. It has a zipper to allow you to remove the pouch which I didnt really understand as I just washed it as a whole. I had bought the largest size as I was afraid it might not fit properly which was a good call as it fits me just right with a bit of room to spare. The only thing I would say was bad about this product as the smell when it came in but that was easily dealt with by washing it right away.
product_name: Ladyjiao Womens Mewgaroo Pet Holder Cat Eared kangaroo Pouch Sweatshirt Hoodie

reviews:
The fabric is not only thin, it's stiff, not at all hoodie material!
I sized up one after reading reviews... it's a good fit but the stiffness of the fabric in the shoulders is quite uncomfortable.
I would recommend just sewing your own pet pocket onto a real hoodie instead of buying this one... not worth the $30.
I have yet to try it with my Sphynx as he comes home next month.
product_name: Ladyjiao Womens Mewgaroo Pet Holder Cat Eared kangaroo Pouch Sweatshirt Hoodie

reviews:
I love this idea, my husband purchased it for me for Christmas and I absolutely love it.
It did take nearly a month to arrive so keep that in mind when purchasing as a gift.
My cat however does not love the pouch, he is a small cat (10lbs) and he does not fit comfortably in the pouch.
I have this in a large and it fits quite big on me (which is a good thing for this type of product), my measurements for reference are:
chest: 36inches
waist: 30inches
hips: 40 inches
product_name: Ladyjiao Womens Mewgaroo Pet Holder Cat Eared kangaroo Pouch Sweatshirt Hoodie

reviews: I bought this hoody to carry by 3.3 lb puppy.I read reviews saying the sizing is smaller to order bigger then I am.It is way way to big on me for one.I washed it hoping it would shrink,but no luck.I thought it was like a regular hoody,warm,but it is as thin as a t-shirt.The inside of the hood and pocket material got all over the place coming off on other parts of the shirt.Not a good buy at all.
